segments.text: I was wondering if you could help me to get a library card .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course , just fill out this form and let me know when you are finished .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I will also need your driver's license ; hand me the filled-out form , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , the form is all filled out .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Perfect ! Do you know the hours and rules for the library ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I have no idea what they are .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Everything you need to know is printed on the card and handout .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Great ! You are all set to enjoy the library .
segments.speaker: S2
